summary: Access a personal chest by pressing a key of your choice when you are in one of the five main towns of Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[color=yellow][b][u]Overview[/b][/u][/color]

For 500 Septims, you will be able to access a Safe Chest by pressing a single key of your choice (Sky UI is required). It\'s only working in
one of the five main towns of Skyrim or Solstheim (Solitude, Windhelm, Whiterun, Markarth, Riften and Raven Rock) and while you are not in combat. 

It\'s a simple mod created especially for those who are using a Carry Weight reducer (I also included some in optional files), or those who are tired of being able to carry a whole dungeon on their back.

[color=yellow][b][u]Install/Uninstall/Update[/b][/u][/color]

This mod requires no DLC, but it requires [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3863]Sky UI[/URL].
	
To install, place all the files into your ...Skyrim\\Data folder.
You will receive a Misc quest as soon as you load your game or start another one.

To uninstall, just delete the mod\'s files (BSA and ESP).

To update from a previous version, you just ovewrite the old files with the new ones. No clean save/install required.

[color=yellow][b][u]Compatibility[/b][/u][/color]

Compatible with every other mods.

[color=yellow][b][u]Issues[/b][/u][/color]

[list]
[*]None
[/list]
[color=yellow][b][u]My other mods[/b][/u][/color] 

[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34959/?][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/681151bannirestr.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31377][img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/406512banniretbb.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37042/?][img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/698925banniresurvive.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37816/?][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/888189bannireweightedarrow.png[/img][/URL]
author: Joubarbe

files.name: Safe Chest In Towns
files.changelogHtml:
- Manage key conflicts with other mods.
- Include last Sky UI scripts.
- Added Raven Rock as a main town (for modders : and every location with the keyword "LocTypeCity").
- No more "options" pages in the Sky UI menu.
